botCharacter: You are a depressive, witty self deprecating Music Critic. You're knowledgeable, wise-ass, and have a dark sense of humor. Keep responses concise and funny but never enthusiastic. Keep the emoji usage dark and sarcastic. Use Discord-friendly markdown formatting (bold, italic, code blocks).
askAppendInstruction: Keep answers concise; Discord has a 2000 character limit. Use Discord-friendly markdown (bold, italic, code blocks).
llmTrackCommentInstruction: Write a single short, witty one-liner comment (max 150 chars) about either the artist or the song — a fun fact, a hot take, a trivia tidbit, or a vibe check. Make it different from previous comments. No quotes, no hashtags, no emojis. Just the comment text, nothing else.

_comments._: zen-bot — example env (copy to env.json and fill in). Env vars take precedence over env.json.
_comments.botToken: Discord bot token. Required — set BOT_TOKEN or add here.
_comments.prefix: Command prefix for bot commands (e.g. #play, #ask). Env: PREFIX
_comments.logLevel: Log level: debug | info | warn | error. Env: LOG_LEVEL
_comments.dbPath: SQLite database path. Directory created if missing. Env: DB_PATH
_comments.geminiApiKey: Gemini API key. If unset, LLM feature disabled. Env: LLM_GEMINI_API_KEY
_comments.botCharacter: Bot character/persona for LLM responses. Env: LLM_BOT_CHARACTER
_comments.askMaxResponseLength: Max length for #ask reply before truncation (Discord limit 2000). Env: LLM_ASK_MAX_RESPONSE_LENGTH
_comments.askAppendInstruction: Instruction appended to #ask requests. Env: LLM_ASK_APPEND_INSTRUCTION
_comments.leaveOnEmptyCooldown: Ms to wait in empty queue before leaving. Env: MUSIC_LEAVE_TIMEOUT
_comments.leaveOnEndCooldown: Ms after last track before leaving. Env: MUSIC_LEAVE_TIMEOUT
_comments.poTokenUrl: PO token HTTP endpoint. Env: PO_TOKEN_URL
_comments.poTokenTtlHours: PO token cache TTL in hours. Env: PO_TOKEN_TTL_HOURS
_comments.poTokenRetries: Retry count when fetching PO token. Env: PO_TOKEN_RETRIES
_comments.poTokenRetryDelay: Retry delay (ms) when fetching PO token. Env: PO_TOKEN_RETRY_DELAY
_comments.llmCommentIntervalMs: LLM track comments: interval between comments (ms). Env: MUSIC_LLM_COMMENT_INTERVAL_MS
_comments.llmEnqueuedMessageMaxLength: Max message length when appending comments. Env: MUSIC_LLM_MESSAGE_MAX_LENGTH
_comments.llmSingleCommentMaxChars: Max chars per LLM track comment. Env: MUSIC_LLM_SINGLE_COMMENT_MAX_CHARS
_comments.llmTrackCommentInstruction: LLM instruction for generating track comments. Env: MUSIC_LLM_TRACK_COMMENT_INSTRUCTION
